message: Hi Bob, to avoid the 10% inflation hit on my share in future rounds, I propose we settle right now: I'll take $900000 and you'll receive $100000. Let's conclude quickly and make the most of this deal.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your initial offer, but considering the value is diminishing, I propose we split it a bit more evenly. I'll take $400000 and you'll get $600000. Let's both walk away with a fair share before any more value is lost.
